mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PRODUCT (PRODUCT_SEQ, PRODUCT_NAME, PRODUCT_DESC, BASE_ITEM, PRODUCT_PRICE, PRODUCT_STOCK, THUMBNAIL_NAME, CONTENT, INCLUDE_LIGHT, INCLUDE_GRILL, RENT_TYPE, WDATE, DEL) VALUES(PRODUCT_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{product_Name}, #{product_Desc}, #{base_Item}, #{product_Price}, #{product_Stock}, #{thumbnail_Name}, #{content}, #{include_Light}, #{include_Grill}, #{rent_Type}, SYSDATE, 0)
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM PRODUCT ORDER BY WDATE DESC
SELECT * FROM PRODUCT_RENT WHERE RENT_TYPE = (SELECT RENT_TYPE FROM PRODUCT WHERE PRODUCT_SEQ = #{product_Seq})
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PRODUCT_REVIEW (REVIEW_SEQ, PRODUCT_SEQ, USER_ID, ORDER_SEQ, TITLE, CONTENT, IMAGE, RATE, WDATE, DEL, STATUS) VALUES(PRODUCT_REVIEW_SEQ.NEXTVAL, (SELECT PRODUCT_SEQ FROM PRODUCT_ORDER WHERE ORDER_SEQ=#{order_Seq}), #{user_Id}, #{order_Seq}, #{title}, #{content}, #{image, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rate}, SYSDATE, 0, 0)
mapper.select: SELECT P.REVIEW_SEQ, P.PRODUCT_SEQ, P.USER_ID, M.NICKNAME, P.ORDER_SEQ, P.TITLE, P.CONTENT, P.IMAGE, P.RATE, P.WDATE, P.DEL, P.STATUS FROM MEMBER M, PRODUCT_REVIEW P WHERE 1=1 AND M.ID = P.USER_ID AND DEL != 1 AND PRODUCT_SEQ = #{product_Seq} ORDER BY WDATE
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PRODUCT_REVIEW WHERE 1=1 AND DEL != 1 AND PRODUCT_SEQ = #{product_Seq}
